Its capital is Riohacha. It covers most of the Guajira Peninsula in the northeast region of the country. La Guajira is on the Caribbean Sea and bordering Venezuela. ==Municipalities== # Albania # Barrancas # Dibulla # Distracci√≥n # El Molino # Fonseca # Hatonuevo # La Jagua del Pilar # Maicao # Manaure # Riohacha # San Juan del Cesar # Uribia # Urumita # Villanueva ==References== Category:Departments of Colombia Category:1960s establishments in Colombia Category:1965 establishments
